content: Curtis Sliwa's website has nothing but good to say about Weber. Even goes as far as to say the man had great parties in his home. What he failed to mention is that Weber was a Child Molestor. Weber was a central pivot in Mayor Bloomburg's ABC broadcast. Now, it seems, Bloomburg was working/socializing with a Child Molestor. Media doesn't know what to think. No one is calling Weber out for being a predatory Sex Offender. It has become a side story today on NY Post website. It was front page news this morning... The 16 year old was a sicko. But he won't get life or anything because he was a vicitim. I don't see Weber getting any news accolades.
